parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: decimal Required when location isn't provided. Latitude of the location you want to deliver to.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: decimal Required when location isn't provided. Longitude of the location you want to deliver to.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: string Required when latitude and longitude aren't provided. Address of the location you want to deliver to.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: string Optional. Specify the interface locale; this determines the language of reviews to return. See the list of supported locales .

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: string Optional. Specify the locale to return the business information in. See the list of supported locales .

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: string Required. Text to return autocomplete suggestions for.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: decimal Required if want to get autocomplete suggestions for businesses. Latitude of the location to look for business autocomplete suggestions.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: decimal Required if want to get autocomplete suggestions for businesses. Longitude of the location to look for business autocomplete suggestions.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: string Optional. Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in. See the list of supported locales .

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: string Required. Phone number of the business you want to search for. It must start with + and include the country code, like +14159083801.

info: This is the information of the API
